mapper.insert: insert into text (text_id, text_subject, text_difficulty, text_image_url, text_note_flag, text_note_text, text_note_image) values (#{textId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{textSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textNoteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{textNoteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textNoteImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update text set text_subject = #{textSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_difficulty = #{textDifficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_image_url = #{textImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_note_flag = #{textNoteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, text_note_text = #{textNoteText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, text_note_image = #{textNoteImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where text_id = #{textId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select text_id, text_subject, text_difficulty, text_image_url, text_note_flag, text_note_text, text_note_image from text where text_id = #{textId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select text_id, text_subject, text_difficulty, text_image_url, text_note_flag, text_note_text, text_note_image from text
